# ItemUseOnBeforeEvent Class

## Extends
- [*ItemUseOnAfterEvent*](ItemUseOnAfterEvent.md)

Contains information related to an item being used on a block.

## Properties

### **cancel**
`cancel: boolean;`

If set to true, this will cancel the item use behavior.

Type: *boolean*
